snippet: Jonathan Toubin, a Brooklyn D.J., is back spinning records, less than five months after a bizarre accident left him close to death in Portland, Ore.
abstract: Brooklyn DJ Jonathan Toubin was badly injured in December 2011 when a taxi crashed through the wall of his hotel room in Portland, Ore; after months of recovery and physical therapy he is once again hosting dance parties around New York City.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Toubin, a Brooklyn D.J., is back spinning records, less than five months after a bizarre accident left him close to death in Portland, Ore.

headline.seo: A D.J. Recovers From a Nearly Fatal Accident on Tour
headline.main: Back Spinning, After the World Stopped
headline.print_headline: Back Spinning, After the World Stopped
